item.description:
@system wrote:

another stupid post by king_swintell

ok welcome to another "help me!!! im a retard and ive fallen and cant get up! post "

so welcome bak ppls
================================1st problem========================================
ok my first problem is i cant make players admin…i go to client and i search for admin and i come to the thin says 1= mod 2= admin 3= staff and then i go down la de la la then i find thi

/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

/checkmods();
checkadmins();
checkstaff();
if(checkmods() == 5)
playerRights = 1;
if(checkadmins() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“blank”)) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“blank”)
playerRights = 2;
if(checkstaff() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“blank”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“blank”))
playerRights = 3;/

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“blank23”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

			if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("blank34"))
			{
				playerRights = 1;

now wen i insert in the player rights 3 and 1 slot were it says blank 23 and 34 see…well that works but were the one says if (playername.eqaulsignorecase(“blank”))
{
player rights = 2
}
right? well its not there if thats not rigth tell me pleaase

==================================seconds error=====================================
my second error is rather weired if a player goes up some steps and can get bak down they tend to teleport
but theres a twist! wen the die or teleport the a resuspened above the lvl! =(), well this is bad cuz i dont know how to get them down and they get mad at me cuz they have to make a new file…i make numerouse warning not to go upany stairs…but yet they find there wat up there…sigh kids wat r ya gonna do rigth?
lol well i know what im going to do im going to get help from u guys
well heres what it looks like

==============================third error!============================================
these few things arnt really an error yet just some commen stuff i dont know yet so bear with me peepz =)

ok first of all how do i make were u cant pk everyware… i mean ffs ppl get so mad lol its everywere sept bank and train area so if u can help! please do so! =)

second id like to know how to make one of my owner chars were they never die please =) im tired of ppl killing my char wen im helping new players…i mena i usually bust out the p ring =) but its still anoying
now i dont wnat to on my pker char just my king_swintell char
====================================thank you ppl===================================
really thank you from the bottem of my heart you helping ppl is what makes mopar so special =)

THE END!
